SOLD!
CRANBOURNE EAST: If you have been searching for the perfect property to break into the market, downsize into or add to your property portfolio without having to endure a lengthy building process then I suggest you snap up this fine opportunity.
This property offers a free flowing floor plan sure to be appreciated by all. Positioned on a low maintenance allotment, the property offers 4 spacious robed bedroom all with BIR's and space heaters. Extra internal extras and inclusions are 2nd living area/ landing upstairs, S/S air con, a great mix of quality tiles, carpet and floorboards & neutral paint tones throughout.

Also located nearby is the newly constructed Casey Fields football ground, Casey Race Recreation & Aquatic Centre, and Casey Library.
